EmailTemplate.description: This email template is used to send email to Work Order Reopen Requester when a reopen request is denied.
EmailTemplate.name: Work Order : Reopen Request Denial Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Work Order # {!SVMXC__Service_Order__c.Name} Reopen Request Has been Denied : {!SVMXC__Service_Order__c.SVMX_PS_Subject__c} : {!SVMXC__Service_Order__c.Case_Thread_ID__c}
